MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH21 postcode area of Musselburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.16pm to repair an underground cable located near to Stoneyhill Farm caused by third party damage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.44pm om Tuesday 2nd March 2021.
